landing-page-description: PT. Gistex Garment Indonesia is a garment manufacturing company that produces ready-to-wear clothing with quality craftsmanship. They use advanced technology to enhance productivity, including AI and automated robots.
our-goals-description: Our company is dedicated to providing top-quality and cutting-edge garment production services to our clients with people, materials and systems that support
to-keep-workplace: To keep workplace energetic and fun
promote-team-work: Promote team work, process improvement based on empowered human resources
constant-and-continuous-improvement-in-p: Constant and continuous improvement in product quality
our-production-unit-description: This investment has allowed us to not only maintain our high quality standards but also significantly increase our production capacity, ensuring that we can meet your needs more effectively.
consistent-investment: Consistent Investment in Automation and Technology
consistent-investment-description: This investment has enabled us to maintain our quality standards while increasing our production capacity.
certifications-description: Our Commitment to Quality Standards and Sustainability
global-shipping-16-desc: Currently, we export to over 16 countries and are continuously expanding as we increase our production capacity and garment quality. Each step we take is aimed at broadening our global reach, bringing our product excellence directly to you.
join-us: Join us to make a positive impact on each other and the world.
sport-performance-wear: For Sport Performance Wear, Basic, and Fashion
footer-desc: PT. Gistex Garment Indonesia is a garment manufacturing company that produces ready-to-wear clothing with quality craftsmanship. Discover the Meticulous Process Behind Every Piece of Our Fashion
our-technology-description: Our technology is designed to meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency. We use advanced machinery and software to ensure precision and speed in our production processes.
